title: Open Tues 6-6:15pm,Classic SF,Pr.Deck,Pkg Avail(1737B Broadway)
posting_body: ['3BR/2BA', '* $4,750/month annual lease', '* Private deck', '* Decorative fireplace', '* Laundry in building', "* Parking at an add'l fee", '* Available: Sept 1st', 'OPEN HOUSE: Tuesday(8/2)', '6pm-6:15pm', 'ADDRESS: 1737B Broadway', 'Gorgeous, top, second floor 3BR/2BA flat in Pacific Heights.', 'Classic San Francisco high ceilings with moldings, lovely hardwood floors throughout except in kitchen and baths.', 'Large living room has bay windows at one end, opens onto the foyer at the other.', "Across from one another at the living room's foyer end are the decorative fireplace and the door to the master bedroom.", 'Kitchen, dining room and deck are at the far end of the flat.', 'Modern kitchen includes gas stove, dishwasher, black granite counters, including small breakfast bar, and attractive, dark wood cabinets.', 'Dining room is large and opens onto the fair-sized deck.', 'The dining room includes built-in shelving and a pantry.', 'The deck overlooks the yard, can accommodate furniture and BBQ.', 'Three bedrooms are large and elegant; the third is small, does not have a closet, and would work well as a nursery or office.', 'The master bedroom has a large shower stall with sliding glass doors.', 'The second large bedroom is mid-flat, has windows at both ends of the room, and a wall closet with sliding doors.', 'Third room can be used as a nursery or a bedroom.', 'The main bath is accessed via the foyer and has standard shower-over-tub.', 'Shared laundry in building.', 'Parking is available at an additional fee.', 'No pets.', 'Both Walk Score and Transit Score are 94.', "Lafayette Park is 3.5 blocks away; Van Ness, 1.5 blocks; Polk Street's shopping and dining district, 2.5 blocks.", 'Several public transportation options are within easy walking distance including bus lines 10, 19, 47, 49, and Silicon Valley shuttles on Van Ness.', 'Lines 1, 41 and 45 within easy walking distance.', "Tenant pays a one-time broker's fee.", 'Everest Mwamba', 'DRE# 01717299', 'Kenney & Everest Real Estate', 'DRE# 01984640', 'show contact info', 'office', 'Apply at: <URL>', 'Leasing and Real Estate: Our Family Business for Over 100 Years.', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
